ygData.subject: Re: Web Site to Purchase EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Book is very Xpensive, about S$40 bucks, Game at a shop call Ouni  in SimLimor OR call  New Era Interactive, dunno tel no. call 100, operator yiyang of
ygData.messageBody:
Book is very Xpensive, about S$40 bucks,
Game at a shop call "Ouni " in SimLimor OR call New Era Interactive, dunno tel no. call 100, operator

yiyang of Innoruuk

-----Original Message-----
From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, June 11, 1999 2:09 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Web Site to Purchase EQ


thanks for the info. btw, any idea how much u can get them for? the game itself and the guide? if the guide is less than 20 bucks i think its not that bad... unless some folks wanna zap fer me :) also, the bad thing is... im not in singapore now :( but thanks anyway.
----- Original Message -----
From: Alex
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
Sent: Friday, June 11, 1999 3:04 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Web Site to Purchase EQ


EQ is avaible in SIngapore. Distributed by a Singapore comapny- New Era
Selling cheaper than u buy on-line
Saw them at SIm lim almost 2 weeks liao....a shop near the escalator, i think its 4th flr.

EQ offical guide , i only saw it , last month at Borders. Xpensive and not so informative.

Yiyang Of innoruuk

From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>
To: SG-Everquest Mailing List <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

Subject: [sg-everquest] Web Site to Purchase EQ


anyone know a good site that i can buy EQ from? or r they already selling that in local shops already? also, anyone know if they have the EQ Guide book in singapore? i know that they might not be as useful... but i think they somehow will be helpful least fer starters like me... :)

cheers,
Fred aka SilverHand
